tool_description: Extracts technical and descriptive metadata from digital files including format identification, file properties, embedded metadata, and content analysis for cataloging purposes.

file_path.description: Full path to the digital file to be analyzed

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis: basic, standard, or comprehensive

extract_embedded_metadata.description: Whether to extract embedded metadata from file headers

content_analysis.description: Whether to perform OCR or content recognition analysis

error_messages: File not found: Verify the file_path exists and is accessible
Unsupported file format: The file format is not supported for analysis
File access denied: Check file permissions and system access rights
Invalid analysis depth: Use basic, standard, or comprehensive
Corrupted file: The file appears to be damaged or incomplete
usage: Provide file_path to analyze a digital asset. Set analysis_depth for thoroughness level, extract_embedded_metadata to include file headers, and content_analysis for text extraction. Returns comprehensive technical and descriptive metadata.

file_format.description: Identified file format and MIME type

technical_metadata.description: Array of technical metadata key-value pairs

embedded_metadata.description: Array of extracted embedded metadata elements

content_summary.description: Brief summary of file contents if analysis was performed
